result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Anthony A. Roberts

records.addlTxt:
9:05 AM Defendant Anthony A. Roberts in court.  Attorney Kristi S. Tlusty in court for State of Wisconsin.  Defendant indicates that he wants to accept the district attorney's offer.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 21, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on December 21, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Status conference on October 26, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Pre-trial conference on August 11, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Order for Appearance at Settlement Conference; Report to Court on Results of Settlement Conference.

02:00 PM Defendant Anthony A. Roberts in court.  Kristi S. Tlusty appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court advised DE of charges and penalties; advised of right to attorney. Defendant does not qualify for public defender or court appointed attorney.   Defendant waives time limits for a preliminary hearing.  Bond continued.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 12, 2022 at 01:00 pm. - rt
to defendant re:  appointment of counsel
on Petition for Appointment of an Attorney - Denied

records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt: Adjourned initial appearance on June 7, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
*Defendant shall not leave the State of Wisconsin without prior notice to and written approval of the Court.  Must report to the Taylor County Sheriff's Office for Booking Procedure.

01:30 PM Defendant Anthony A. Roberts in court.  Kristi S. Tlusty appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court advises defendant of charges and penalties.  Attorney Tlusty indicated that she talked to the defendant and he does not qualify for a public defender.  Attorney Tlusty is requesting this be scheduled for an adjourned initial appearance.  Attorney Tlusty requests a $3,000.00 signature bond; booking.  So ordered by the court.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 7, 2022 at 01:00 pm.  - rt
